analysis.description:
TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#464-468) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#467-468)

Reentrancy in ICOEvent.ICO_token_supplyCap (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#586-622):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.parametersAreSet()) (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#587)
	- token.setTokenCapInUnits(total_Token_Supply) (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#615-618)
	- token.mintLockedTokens(mmentTokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#618-620)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- supplySet (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#620)

ESGToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#96)
ESGToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#94)
ESGToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#95)
ICOEvent.minWeiContribution should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#495-497)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol:
	- pragma solidity>=0.4.10 (/unique_chucks/14/0x3744942c42451c2b42f43a51ee9bb6c6ad0fdc86.sol#1): it allows old versions
